00143                 public:
00144                         Transformation(int type) {this->type=type;};

00147                         virtual void apply(Mapping *m, MappingSet **ms) = 0;
00148                         virtual int getComponentIndex() const = 0;
00149                         virtual int getRemovalType() { return -1; };
